name: Oral Overhaul
description:
Repair the patient's teeth as best as you can in this silly dentist simulator!

CONTENT WARNING: Game is not suitable for those who are easily disturbed.

Made for Global Game Jam 2020.

Jam Site FGJ Vaasa Platonic Partnership

Credits: 

http://www.twitter.com/Anttikole

https://twitter.com/venninova

Special thanks to Jussi Loukiainen for the intro exclamation
